price: Sε yεto wͻn gu (egya no) mu a, wͻbεte sε εrepͻ soͻ na εrehuro.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
